group_1.narration: | It's almost time for the cherry blossoms@to bloom. |
| But when the cherry blossoms bloom,@everyone will have to part with someone. |
| Just like Grandfather and Grandmother,@Asuka's student and Ui's teacher... |
| Senior-senpai is worthy of respect, and I think@it's a good spot to go cherry blossom viewing. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of the Chelation Land Mascot
group_1.textRight: | When Eternal Sakura makes it bloom,@someone has to leave?! |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of the Chelation Land Mascot
group_1.textRight: | Tsuruno might disappear! You can't! |

group_1.textLeft: > | If it's going to affect Sana, I'd like you to@avoid going to the cherry blossom viewing. |
> | She finally found a place where she belongs,@and lives happily. |
> | I don't want her to experience loneliness@again. |

group_1.textRight: | The same goes for the Eternal Sakura,@Eternal Sakura. |

group_1.textLeft: | If I make the cherry blossoms bloom... |

group_1.narration: | The four of them might disappear... |

group_1.textRight: Well then, I guess we're doing the cherry@blossom viewing on our day off next week!
We'll hold it, rain or shine! Right?

group_1.textLeft: Um, no, we would cancel if it rains.

group_1.textRight: Ack, it's the opposite!

group_1.textLeft: Do you want to catch a cold?

group_1.textRight: Based on the forecast, it looks like we@shouldn't have any problems for now.

group_1.textLeft: Nemu, do you think this will work with your@schedule?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I'm about to finish writing my current@work.
No problem for me either!
I had a meeting scheduled with an old guy,@but I can cancel if I have a good reason!

group_1.textLeft: Aren't you referring to that university professor?@Are you sure it's okay to cancel like that?

group_1.textRight: It's fine, this is more important!
I've never eaten on the ground of a park@before.
I'm looking forward to bringing a dish to share@with everyone.

group_1.textLeft: We should probably start thinking about@what we're going to make now...

group_1.textRight: Then I'd like to practice before the big day!

group_1.textLeft: I think this would be a good time to start.

group_1.textRight: I only need meat! Just like in manga!

group_1.textLeft: Felicia, you know this won't be a barbecue,@right?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]No way?! We're not grilling anything?!

group_1.textLeft: It would be illegal to use fire in the park...

group_1.textRight: | Excuse me... |

group_1.textLeft: Sakurako, I hope you'll also join us on that day.
But you don't have to force the cherry blossoms@to bloom.

group_1.textRight: | Before that, it's dangerous to let them@bloom... |

group_1.textLeft: Dangerous...?

group_1.textRight: | When the cherry blossoms bloom, it signals@departure... |
| If I let the cherry blossoms bloom, you and@the others might disappear... |

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what?@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]I'm not sure I understand...

group_1.textRight: | I've discussed it with the other Uwasa and@have decided... |
| I won't let Sana or Tsuruno disappear... |
| To prevent us from parting, I won't let the@cherry blossoms bloom. |

group_1.textLeft: What's gotten into her so suddenly...
The other day, Sakurako suddenly asked us@about how to handle a death, didn't she...?
Did something happen to her...?

group_1.textRight: It's possible that something she experienced@while observing the sakura tree affected her...

group_1.textLeft: Some type of sad experience that distorted@her perception...?

group_1.textRight: Sakurako...
She said that when the cherry blossoms bloom, we'll disappear...
